name: Alien Invaders 2D Shooter
description:
This is my first 2D Shooter game. I added the following elements:

  1. Level design, starting with a basic level, then incorporating asteroids + stationary cover, then endless w/ asteroids and moving cover
  2. Asteroid spawner w/ rng element, diagonal + straight shooter spawners
  3. Life counter w/ sprites
  4. Asteroid 'shields' with movement

Credits

Created by Jonathan To
